cast.name: 爱德华多·莱奥 Edoardo Leo
里卡尔多·曼陀里尼 Riccardo Mandolini
维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni

writer.name: 伊万诺·德·马泰奥 Ivano De Matteo

director.name: 伊万诺·德·马泰奥 Ivano De Matteo

introduction: Mia tells the story of a small, simple, happy family who are taken by storm by a manipulative young man who turns this wonderful fifteen-year-old girl’s life upside down until it’s nothing short of a nightmare. He strips her of her beauty and her sense of pleasure and fun. He humiliates and isolates her. And when, with her father’s help, she eventually tires of him and leaves him, he sets about destroying her. Her most private photos and the intimate films they made together are all posted online. When the young woman sees them, a tragic reaction ensues. Her father has only one thing left to cling onto: revenge.
